searchSql.baseSql: select pg.pkid,uoj.id uojId,uoj.org_id,j.job_name,u.real_name,pg.belong_month,pg.goal_perf goal_perf,pg.status,pg.create_by ,pg.create_time from sctrans.SYS_USER_ORG_JOB uoj inner join sctrans.SYS_USER u on u.id= uoj.USER_ID left join sctrans.t_yucui_org_hierarchy yoh on uoj.ORG_ID=yoh.TEAM_ID left join sctrans.SYS_JOB j on uoj.JOB_ID=j.ID left join sctrans.T_TS_PERF_GOAL pg on pg.team=uoj.ORG_ID and pg.user_id=uoj.USER_ID and pg.job=uoj.JOB_ID and DATEDIFF(mm ,GETDATE(),pg.belong_month)=#currentMonthDiff# where uoj.IS_DELETED='0' and u.IS_DELETED='0' and u.AVAILABLE='1' and yoh.DISTRICT_ID=#orgId# and j.JOB_CODE='consultant' <if test="status != null and status == 'null' "> and pg.status is null </if> <if test="status != null and status != 'null' and status != '' "> and pg.status = #status# </if>
